## Installation

You can install the released version of smmtools from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("smmtools")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("beyondpie/smmtools")
```

### Under inst dir, we have some utilities, which is now organised as a python package named smmuty.

```shell
## install the local package smmuty
git clone https://github.com/beyondpie/smmtools
cd smmtools/inst
pip install -e smmuty
```
